name: Rising Star in a Hard World
name_original: Rising Star in a Hard World
description:
Try to make it to the top in a hard world-

This is something i do not want to talk about.

Proudly made at the JamJam2022 Summer Event in Finland at the 1-hour jam workshop. Theme of the jam was "Slippery Holographic Golden Dicks" so I went with the obvious. Massive hangover so brain processing power could only muster this masterpiece of a game
